Name: Shovel
Description: A rusty shovel with a few knicks in the cutting edge.  It has obviously served another fighter well.

Defend.Name: Block
Defend.Action_String: <User> enters a defensive pose, preparing to block 7 damage.

Attack.Name: Whack
Attack.Action_String: <User> quickly strikes <Target> with their shovel, dealing <Damage> damage.

Attack Crit.Name: Block
Attack Crit.Action_String: <User> recovers to a defensive position, preparing to block 7 damage.

Special.Name: Charge
Special.Action_String: <User> waits for an opening and strikes <Target>, dealing <Damage> damage.
